name: Vambully
description:
YOU ARE HUNGRY! Use the traps in your fortified castle to keep your prey inside, or you will starve for the night.

Armed traps are distributed throughout your castle to stop anyone from getting out. Using them at the right time will slow down your prey, using them foolishly will accelerate  Use them wisely, or your prey will escape.

Controls

Left click to interact with traps

Stop your meal from running away!

Story

A vampire, thirsty for blood spends most of the day inside his castle, attempting to lure people inside, by leaving everything open. A curious young man walks into the castle, assuming it is abandoned. Once deep inside the castle, he realized that he was lured inside by a vampire. He doesn't skip a beat and tries to make an escape.

Install

1. Unzip the file

2. Open the .exe file

3. Have fun!

Game Jam

This game was made as an entry for a game jam, hosted by the HTK academy. The game follows the theme "You are the enemy" which inspired us switch the roles between the hero and the villan. Instead of traditionally taking control over the hero, you take control of the antagonist, which in this case is the vampire living in the castle.
